about.title: ğŸ‘‹ About Me
description: I'm Joe Jigwan, a senior Computer Engineering student at Kyonggi University and an aspiring IT systems engineer. Through various projects, Iâ€™ve worked on server/DB operations, log analysis, AWS infrastructure setup, and CI/CD automation â€” gaining experience close to real-world service environments.

Through capstone, team, and research projects, I developed skills in operating REST API servers, handling real-time data processing with MongoDB Change Streams, and managing AWS-based deployments, focusing on system stability, operational efficiency, and understanding how services behave in production.
about.strength1: Experience operating RESTful API servers with Spring Boot and managing AWS infrastructure
about.strength2: Data-centric skills including schema design, indexing, and log-based analysis using RDB and MongoDB
about.strength3: Experience working with React + TypeScript SPA (for understanding full service workflow)
about.strength4: Problem-solving experience across diverse environments including YOLO/TACO-based detection and RAG-based car assistant systems

projects.title: ğŸ’¼ Featured Projects
projects.movie_diary: An AI emotion-based service that analyzes user diaries to classify emotions and recommends movies. Built with React and Flask.
projects.gildongE: A Spring Boot and MongoDB-based car assistant backend system. Handled real-time notifications, consumable replacement calculations, and API deployment.
projects.build_your_health: A React-based health routine management app. Allows users to log status data and manage goal-based routines.
projects.kakao_clone: A KakaoTalk UI clone project from the Nomad Coders Challenge. Selected as an outstanding work. Implemented responsive UI and message list interface using HTML/CSS/JS.
projects.dragonball: A price comparison web service for PC parts
projects.dynamic_scraper: Web crawling practice using BeautifulSoup + Playwright
projects.momentum: A clone of the Momentum app implementing weather, greeting, and to-do list
